testcase.name: transformSuccess should propagate the failure of a failed computation
recoverFailure should recover from failed computations
sequenceComputations should start the second computation after the first has completed
sequenceComputations should not start the second computation if the first has failed
concurrentComputations should start both computations independently of each otherâ€™s completion
insist should not retry successful computations
futurize should handle successful computation results
